subject: Football
lead_paragraph: The 330-pound defensive tackle Haloti Ngata will be a difficult assignment for the Jets’ center, either Nick Mangold, who is coming off an injury, or the rookie Colin Baxter.
snippet: The 330-pound defensive tackle Haloti Ngata will be a difficult assignment for the Jets’ center, either Nick Mangold, who is coming off an injury, or the rookie Colin Baxter.
